services.description: Scalable IaaS platform offering high-performance virtual machines with dedicated cores or vCPUs. Supports live vertical scaling of CPU and RAM without rebooting, enabling flexible resource management for varying workloads.

Cost-effective, pre-configured virtual private server instances (VPS) with NVMe storage. Designed for balanced workloads like development environments and web hosting, offering predictable performance and pricing.

Dedicated private cloud infrastructure powered by VMware. Provides a fully managed, single-tenant environment with root access, allowing migration of legacy VMware workloads to the cloud without re-architecting.

Automated scaling service that adjusts the number of virtual machine instances in a group based on defined metrics and policies, ensuring application availability and cost efficiency during traffic fluctuations.
High-performance, network-attached block storage for compute instances. Available in HDD and SSD tiers, supporting dynamic resizing and dual-redundancy to ensure data persistence and reliability.

S3-compatible object storage service for storing and retrieving large amounts of unstructured data. Features scalability, high availability, and bucket-level access policies, suitable for backups, archiving, and media hosting.
Fully managed backup solution powered by Acronis. Protects virtual machines, applications, and data with customizable schedules, encryption, and incremental backups to ensure business continuity.
Managed shared file storage utilizing the NFS protocol. Allows multiple virtual machines to access shared data simultaneously, ideal for clustered applications and content management systems.

Layer 4 load balancing service that distributes TCP/UDP traffic across multiple targets. Ensures high availability and fault tolerance for applications by automatically rerouting traffic from unhealthy instances.
Layer 7 load balancer for HTTP/HTTPS traffic management. Features SSL termination, path-based routing, and cookie persistence to optimize application delivery and simplify certificate management.
Enables instances in private networks to access the internet for updates and patches without exposing them to incoming external traffic, maintaining security and network isolation.
Scalable and programmable Domain Name System service. Allows management of DNS zones and records via API or console, ensuring fast and reliable domain resolution for global users.
Automatic distributed denial-of-service protection that detects and mitigates malicious traffic attacks. safeguarding infrastructure availability without requiring manual intervention.
Managed VPN service establishing secure, encrypted IPsec connections between local on-premises networks and the IONOS Cloud virtual data centers, enabling hybrid cloud architectures.
Fully managed Kubernetes service facilitating the deployment and operation of containerized applications. Handles control plane management, updates, and scaling, allowing teams to focus on workloads.
Secure, private repository for storing and managing Docker container images. Integrated with Managed Kubernetes for streamlined deployment pipelines and access control.

Managed PostgreSQL database service offering high availability, automated backups, and scalability. Removes the administrative burden of patching and maintenance, ensuring a production-ready SQL environment.
Managed MongoDB service providing a document-oriented NoSQL database. Supports clustering, sharding, and automated backups for scalable, high-performance modern application development.
Managed MariaDB service delivering a reliable open-source relational database. Features automated replication, updates, and monitoring to support enterprise-grade transactional applications.
Managed Redis-compatible in-memory data store. Delivers sub-millisecond latency for caching, session management, and real-time analytics by keeping data in RAM.
Fully managed Apache Kafka service for real-time data streaming and event processing. Handles cluster provisioning and scaling, enabling reliable ingestion of high-throughput data streams.
Platform providing access to open-source foundation models (e.g., Llama, Mistral) via API. Enables integration of generative AI capabilities like text and image generation into applications.
Centralized monitoring solution that collects and visualizes metrics from infrastructure resources. Provides dashboards and alerting capabilities to track performance and health.
Centralized log management service. Aggregates and stores logs from various sources, enabling search, analysis, and troubleshooting of system and application events.
Service for managing SSL/TLS certificates. Simplifies the provisioning, renewal, and deployment of certificates for secure communication across load balancers and web endpoints.
Firewall management service allowing the definition of inbound and outbound traffic rules. Policies can be applied to multiple network interfaces to enforce consistent security postures.
Content Delivery Network service that caches content at edge locations globally. Reduces latency and server load by serving static assets closer to end-users.
